goals: On Techmeme, locate the Meta coverage block and identify these links: https://investor.atmeta.com/investor-news/press-release-details/2026/Meta-Reports-Fourth-Quarter-and-Full-Year-2025-Results/default.aspx, https://techcrunch.com/2026/01/28/zuckerberg-teases-agentic-commerce-tools-and-major-ai-rollout-in-2026/, https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-01-28/meta-says-2026-spending-will-blow-past-analysts-estimates. Prefer links found on the page; only open those links and avoid unrelated/social links.
Create a new collection titled "Meta 2026 coverage", add the three URLs, and capture each source with bounded Markdown (maxChars 24000).
Using only the collection sources, answer: "What are the key differences in how each outlet is covering this story?" Provide a concise comparison with citations.
